title: Mouse VGU
body:
So I've been thinking for a while that the in-game mouse needs an update. i feel like what Overwatch and other games such as cs:go have done is a good example where players can actually choose their own mouse design, which is great because for certain players they not be able to see a particular colour which may put them at a disadvantage. Also i kinda feel like the mouse being yellow is kind of an issue because with all of the effects that are going off in a team fight, it has been a very difficult task for me to simply keep track of my mouse on-screen (i play with all settings at max, which means all effects are really prominent, and most of the effects in game are yellow for the most-part). another reason this came to mind is because the ping mouse (when you press 'G' in-game, recently got a visual update so it stands out even more that the normal mouse doesn't have an update. 

(tl:dr)
So basically all i'm asking for is to be able to change the size of the mouse, freely change the colour, and for the mouse to get a well-deserved visual update.

replies.body: I notice sometimes as well. I look at it and just think "Why exactly is my cursor a chainmail gauntlet?" I know it's a classic thing but it could probably be upgraded to something a bit more league specific.

Would be cool if the champion you picked changed the cursor.  If they wanted to space out the work they could give it to us in a similar way to ward skins.  Wouldn't mind seeing a cursor skin in a hextech chest.
I think they are working on it. Because the Ping Cursor got changed recently. (And it looks sexy af.)
I heavily disagree. I **love the current cursor**. Its the one of the only things that hasn't been completely revamped. It works and its fitting. When I see it, I think "Thats the League cursor."
